thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 119 of 3256
thread.title: Jose Luis

author: Jose Luis
title: Jose Luis
text: When collecting rented car I was only informed at the counter of an extra charge of 2€ per day due to the car being diesel rather than petrol. That charge was never showed in the Rentalcars agreement but only in the rental car company T&C's. Being a total of 14€ and knowing that the cost in diesel would be less than petrol I did not complained too much. However, would be nice if Rentalcars could offer all the information, including these type of charges, in advance. Not very clear in their vouchers what is included and what it is not.
